name: Girls and Tests
description:
Try to find out what Mariah and Sonya like! In this short game you'll need to answer the questions of these two girls. Each girl has certain character, so be careful, answering the questions. If you're lucky and answered correct to all of them, then girls, probably, will have something to say or show!

Amazing and relaxing space soundtrack, two gorgeous girls, what else do you need?!
